class errite.cogs.daCommands.daCog(bot)¶

Bases: discord.ext.commands.cog.Cog

The Deviant Art component class for DeviantCord

deletefolder = <discord.ext.commands.core.Command object>¶
error_handler(loop, context)¶
fix_error(amount)¶
getNewToken()¶

Gets a new token from DeviantArt with no params, grabs the clientid and clientsecret from the class file. This function is ran every 40 minutes. DA’s tokens last 60.

help = <discord.ext.commands.core.Command object>¶
help_errorhandler(ctx, error)¶
instantTokenDiagnosisRenewal()¶

Gets a new token without any async delays from DeviantArt, and returns a bool if successful

instantTokenRenewal()¶

Gets a new token without any async delays from DeviantArt, when a 403 is returned this is the first method ran to try to fix the issue.

listfolders = <discord.ext.commands.core.Command object>¶
manualSync = <discord.ext.commands.core.Command object>¶
manualgetNewToken()¶

Gets a new token from DeviantArt with no params, grabs the clientid and clientsecret from the class file. This function is only ran when a token error occurs having to do with async tasks also failing.

rateLimitMeasure()¶

Triggered when DA sends a Rate Limit response, this tones down SyncGalleries

setuprole = <discord.ext.commands.core.Command object>¶
setuprole_errorhandler(ctx, error)¶
softTokenRenewal()¶

Gets a new token from DeviantArt with no params, grabs the clientid and clientsecret from the class file. This function is only ran when a token error occurs and fixes the token only!.

This is usually the second method ran to try to fix a token related issue that doesn’t involve a failure of automated async tasks.

syncGalleries()¶

Checks programmed gallery folders for Deviations. This is the method that is ran to trigger every x minutes depending on what the user has it configured to.
